title: ICYMI: Psst! We’ve Got a Secret
description:
Earlier this week, musician Jazmine Sullivan took to Instagram and requested her followers to send in secrets, which she then shared anonymously on her page. On today’s episode, Rachelle and Madison talk about how what Jazmine did isn’t new, secrets sharing as a useful online engagement strategy, and why we’ve all be sharing our secrets online for so long.
Podcast production by Daniel Schroeder and Derek John.
﻿Support ICYMI and listen to the show with zero ads. Sign up to become a Slate Plus member for just $1 for your first month.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: ICYMI: Psst! We’ve Got a Secret
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: The one thing we love more than sharing secrets on the internet is reading the secrets other people have shared.
